medical_history.chief_complaint: Acute onset epigastric and RUQ pain radiating to back.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient reports acute onset of epigastric and RUQ pain radiating to her back for about 9 hours. The pain has improved slightly but is still present. The pain is described as similar to previous attacks of 'gastritis' but is much worse. Additional symptoms include nausea without vomiting and nonbloody diarrhea.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Gastritis diagnosed previously with normal findings on EGD except for inactive gastritis on biopsy. No past surgeries.
medical_history.family_history: No gallbladder disease or cancers; family history of skin cancer.
